product_name: HEAD & SHOULDERS Smooth and Silky Anti Dandruff Shampoo for Softer and Smoother Hair  (1 L)
description:
Go from dry and frizzy hair to smooth and silky hair in just one wash. Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo is formulated with added moisturizers to cleanse and restore dry, frizzy hair and leave you with dandruff free hair*. Go ahead, run your hands through your hair again.
(*visible flakes only, with regular use) - 24 hour frizz control for smooth, beautiful-looking hair - Gentle pH balanced formula for everyday use, even on color treated hair
